production.description:
Media Director:
Name Readings: Created a program to display students names by program. This was used to record voice-over name readings for every student graduating so each student could have their name displayed and read during the ceremony.

coding.description: Using ReactJS and ReactAdmin, I've created frontend solutions for administration and user management tools. I've also worked on the backend to write secure GraphQL queries and mutations for managing user accounts using nestjs.
